title: 36 My Faith Looks Up To Thee

lines: My faith looks up to thee,
Thou Lamb of Calvary, Saviour divine!
Now hear me while I pray,
O let me from this day Be wholly thine.
As thou hast died for me, O, may my love
To thee, Pure, warm, and changeless be,
While life’s dark maze I tread,
Be thou my guide; Bid darkness turn to day
